reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Developing a Legal, Technical and Commercial Roadmap for Supporting Offshore Wind Investments in Turkey

description.narrative: The project aims to strengthen the capacity of the General Directorate of Renewable Energy, Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources, and other relevant Turkish Government agencies to set the regulatory framework for offshore wind energy investments. It will prepare universities and the private sector for the development of offshore wind energy in Turkey through know-how transfer from the UK.
